description: Documentation for the Hologram index system

docs.description: Documentation for the Hologram index system

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: The hologram.index component defines the structure for component indexes that map artifact roles to content-addressed storage.

sections.title: Artifacts
sections.content: Artifacts are content-addressed references to component definitions. Each artifact is identified by its SHA256 hash, making it immutable and verifiable.

sections.title: Usage
sections.content: Every Hologram component has an index file that maps standard roles (spec, implementation, interface, docs, test, manager) to their content addresses.
